column1: Art Institute of Chicago////If you visit only one museum in Chicago
column2: The Art Institute should definitely be it.  Even if you're too cheap to fork out the $18 admission
column3: you can still experience some of the best art around by going for FREE Thursday nights from 5 to 8 pm.  And if you have no idea what's inside The Art Institute
column4: go to Netflix and add Ferris Bueller's Day Off to your queue.
